articles.author: Emma Graham-Harrison
articles.title: Afghans flee Kabul in panic as Taliban forces close in - The Guardian
articles.description: Militants are seven miles from the capital as US marines fly into evacuate American embassy
articles.content: Residents in Kabul were on Saturday night gripped by fear and a panicked search for escape routes from the bloodshed many fear could lie ahead, as the Taliban captured Mazar-e-Sharif, the countrys fo… [+6200 chars]
